thread.title: Priyanka Chopra to attend Oscars 2017 and look who's with her! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra to attend Oscars 2017 and look who's with her! | Zee News

title: Priyanka Chopra to attend Oscars 2017 and look who's with her! | Zee News
text:
Priyanka Chopra to attend Oscars 2017 and look who's with her! By Ritika Handoo | Last Updated: Saturday, February 25, 2017 - 10:07 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Global diva Priyanka Chopra is all set to roll the red carpet at the most popular Academy Awards. The 'Quantico' star will be attending the Oscars 2017 ceremony and how do we know? Well, she took to Twitter and shared a picture too. 
She tweeted: “Change of plans ! Oscars here we come.. @mickjagger LA LA land”. This certainly means that Priyanka is going to shimmer and shine at the ceremony and not only this. Also, she probably will be rooting for 'La La Land'. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 24, 2017 at 6:24pm PST 
The movie has won a roaring applause worldwide and is in the race of winning an Oscar too. PeeCee is meanwhile, will be seen making her big screen Hollywood debut as Victoria Leeds in 'Baywatch'. 
The movie stars Dwayne Johnson aka 'The Rock' in the lead besides Zac Efron and a huge supporting cast. The film is hitting the screens on May 26, 2017. First Published: Saturday, February 25, 2017 - 10:07 More from zeenews
